#define def_int_pack_int_operators ( T   ) 

Value:

uvm_ml_packer_int& uvm_ml_packer_int::operator << (T a) { \
  pack_unsigned(a, m_rep_int);\
  return *this;\
} \
uvm_ml_packer_int& uvm_ml_packer_int::operator >> (T& a) {  \
  unpack_unsigned(a, m_rep_int); \
  return *this; \
}
